songs.title: Pepsi Joy Of Cola
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
My heart won't skip a beat
I never look before I leap
Ride
Just enjoy the ride
There'll be no reason why
‘Cause everything’s alright (alright)
Take your time
Baby take your time
The world is yours and mine
Look and you will find
(And you will find)

[Chorus]
Ba pa pa pa ba pa pa pa
The joy of pepsi

[Verse 2]
The world goes round and round
But some things never change

[Chorus]
Ba pa pa pa ba pa pa pa
The joy of pepsi

[Verse 3]
I know you can feel it
Feel the joy
Look, look and you will find
Its taste is on my mind
And I won’t be denied

[Chorus]
Ba pa pa pa ba pa pa pa
The joy of pepsi
Ba pa pa pa ba pa pa pa
The joy of pepsi
